definition: see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]

sentences.english: Gion Matsuri, which is one of the most famous festivals in Japan, takes place in Kyoto, too.
sentences.chinese: 日本最有名庆典之一的祇园祭也在京都举行。

sentences.english: We are to simply trust God.
sentences.chinese: 我们所要做的祇是信靠仰赖神。

sentences.english: In 1997, its economy finally had positive growth, with a 1% preliminary estimate.
sentences.chinese: 一九九七年经济止跌回升，估计祇有一%成长。

sentences.english: One. That Buddha's lifespan was four hundred billion asamkhyeya kalpas .
sentences.chinese: 彼佛寿命四百千万亿阿僧祇劫。

sentences.english: He only has an elementary knowledge of English grammar.
sentences.chinese: 他祇有基本英文文法的知识。

sentences.english: The Gion district is another landmark in Kyoto .
sentences.chinese: 祇园区是京都的另一个地标。

sentences.english: The collected personal data is solely used for activities of Junior Police Call.
sentences.chinese: 所收集的个人资料，祇供少年警讯之用。

sentences.english: On one occasion Ven. Ananda was staying near Savatthi in Jeta's Grove, Anathapindika's monastery.
sentences.chinese: 一时，尊者阿难住在舍卫城附近的祇树给孤独精舍。

definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
